a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(min(b // a, c))

a,b,c = map(int,input().split())
print(min(b//a,c))


A, B, C = map(int, input().split())

count = 0
while B >= A and count < C:
    B -= A
    count += 1
print(count)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
 
ans = 0
while b >= a and ans < c:
    b -= a
    ans += 1
print(ans)

A,B,C = map(int, input().split())

count = 0
while B >= A and count < C:
    B -= A
    count += 1
print(count)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
